title: Raani Haaram: Heritage Ruby and Polki Diamond Cascade
features: This Raani Haaram showcases a traditional South Indian design with a grand pendant. The central piece features a vibrant ruby cabochon surrounded by meticulously set Polki diamonds. Two peacocks are perched at the top, symbolizing beauty and grace. The pendant hangs gracefully from multiple strands – strings of lustrous freshwater pearls intermixed with strings of vibrant ruby beads, creating a beautiful cascade effect. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting antique charm.
occasions: Special occasions requiring a regal look
description: A stunning statement piece that blends tradition and elegance. The use of Polki diamonds, rubies, and pearls creates a rich and luxurious look, perfect for making a lasting impression. The Raani Haaram is a timeless investment, designed to be cherished for generations, passed down as a valuable family heirloom.
